programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Red Desert

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Cape Coast: Where Worlds Colide
programme.desc: Watch Africa's Cape Coast that goes from the frigid waters of Cape Point to the sub-tropic seas of Kwazulu-Natal.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Amazon River Islands: The Floating Forest
programme.desc: The Anavilhanas and Mariua archipelagos are deep in the heart of the Amazon rainforest. Flooded for 6 months of the year, the islands are a fortress of submerged trees. / Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: Patagonia is a place of extremes Â– of vast ice fields and snow-capped mountains; of windswept deserts, and violent oceans. Survival here means being tough enough to cope with brutal winters, and canny enough to exploit brief seasons of plenty.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Madagascar: Islands of Monsters
programme.desc: Madagascar is truly a weird and wonderful land. Isolated on an island of extreme and magical looking locations, life has adapted and diversified. With few predators, numbers have proliferated and natural selection has gone mad.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earthâ€™s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the worldâ€™s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the worldâ€™s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Land Adventures
programme.desc: Most land adventures come with some risk - a chance to confront our deepest fears, resist the pull of the ordinary, and soar into the wild unknown.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Arks
programme.desc: Cut off from continents, remote islands have become floating arks, attracting migrating species and forging new ones. Take a privileged glimpse into the secret lives of the rare and exotic species that inhabit these lost worlds.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coral Islands
programme.desc: The reef systems that gave rise to coral islands support the vast majority of marine species on our planet, but they are under threat. Explore the delicate balance between exploiting and preserving these extraordinary natural wonders.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur And The Big Riddle/Double Dare
programme.desc: Alex Trebek lends his voice as gameshow host Alex Lebek in this episode which poses the age-old riddle--is winning really everything? What if your friends dared you to skip homework--and then double dared you to skip school?

programme.title: Arthur: Molina's Mulligan/Buster Bombs
programme.desc: Alberto discovers he has a natural talent for golf and begins to compete, but will his dad's embarrassing cheers make him give it up? Buster has lost his flair for funny, and the harder he tries to make people laugh, the worse it gets.

programme.title: Arthur: The "A" Team/Emily Swallows a Horse
programme.desc: Francine and Brain are the best players on the soccer team, and they wish their teammates could take the game a bit more seriously. And then Emily really wants the sparkly ball D.W. just found, so she tells a little white lie about it.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Second Chance/Arthur and the Whole Truth
programme.desc: With the help of a little time travel, Buster turns back the clock to see what his life would be like if he were a genius. Arthur isn't happy when he discovers that Buster has been telling him some white lies, just to spare his feelings.

programme.title: Arthur: Pick a Car, Any Car/Jenna's Bedtime Blues
programme.desc: The family car is broken, and so is Arthur's heart. How can Mom and Dad even think of replacing it? Itâ€™s Muffy's annual slumber party, and Jenna is finally invited! But what if the other girls discover that she's an occasional bed-wetter?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Goes To Washington/Arthur's Mystery Envelope
programme.desc: D.W.'s on her way to Washington and she's bored by it all until she gets lost during a tour of the White House. Then, when Mr. Haney gives Arthur a sealed envelope to bring home to Mom, Arthur fears the worst.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Rules/Meet Binky
programme.desc: Writing your own name in graffiti all over the school wouldn't be very smart, right? Binky says he didn't do it, so detectives Fern and Buster are on the case. Then, Binky is the newest, hottest, hippest pop music craze in Elwood City.

programme.title: Arthur: Listen Up!/Arthur's New Old Vacation
programme.desc: When Francine's Bubbe passes away, Muffy tries to understand how she can help her friend. Then, when Arthur's family goes on the same vacation they take every year, he and Buster try to make it more exciting.

programme.title: An Arthur Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Arthur and his family are getting ready for Thanksgiving! But when Pal disappears to go on his own adventure, family, friends and the rest of Elwood City try to get Pal home. Will they be able to celebrate the best Thanksgiving yet?

programme.title: War Story: The Road to Rome
programme.desc: The Road to Rome examines the incredible experiences of Canadian veterans, the victories and horrors of armoured combat, and the pivotal value, far too often neglected, of the overall Italian Campaign.

programme.title: War Story: Ortona: The War Inside
programme.desc: The War Inside is a personal retelling of one of the fiercest battles of the Italian Campaign from the searing points of view of Canadian infantrymen, a tanker, a stretcher bearer, and a German paratrooper.

programme.title: War Story: Sicily: The First Campaign
programme.desc: The Sicily Campaign began with the largest seaborne invasion in history on 9-10 July 1943. The Allied forces of Britain, Canada, and the United States sought to knock Italy out of the war and attack Germany from the south.

programme.title: War Story: Bomb Girls Remember
programme.desc: During the Second World War, 250,000 Canadian women helped to build the arsenal of democracy. These young women met the challenges of factory work and helped to win the Second World War, and by doing so, paved the way for future generations.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Getting Home
programme.desc: In this film, Bomber Command personnel and a Luftwaffe pilot take the viewer through the frightening reality of fighting in the skies as they try to get a damaged bomber home.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Hitting Back
programme.desc: After surviving the German bombing campaign of British cities, RAF Bomber Command struck back against Germany. The devastating consequences of raids, for both for the young men in the skies and the people on the ground, are portrayed in this film.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Japan continues its suicidal resistance, and invading it looks costly. After 2 atomic bombs, the Emperor intervenes and stops the War. Stalin grabs territory in East Asia. The War is over, and the Atomic Era and the Cold War start.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: In 1945, Germany is crumbly on both fronts. The Western Allies cross the Rhine and take most of Germany, while the Red Army quickly advances into Berlin. After Hitler's suicide, Germany surrenders and is divided among the allied powers.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Harold & Armani
programme.desc: Harold found his match with a beautiful fellow jock named Armani. Although they live in the same area, they've never met. Nev is joined by Angel Haze to help Harold get his perfect girl.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: It's been seven years since April met Dean in a chat room at the age of thirteen. During that time, Dean would often disappear for months at a time. Can Nev and Max help April find Dean? (S6, ep15)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jasmine & Mike
programme.desc: Jasmine has been texting with Mike for two years and thinks he could be the perfect step-father for her son. Although they live only 15 minutes apart, the pair have yet to meet up in person. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tiana & James

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The Mutant X team must stop the auction of a highly lethal substance that a number of notorious international terrorists are vying to acquire.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Street Chase

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Trapped by Time
programme.desc: Liam and Renee learn of a facility where time travelers from the future are being held. They try to learn from them what happens to the Taelons. Sandoval's wife is used as a pawn to gain important information from him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Atonement
programme.desc: Sandoval goes to Renee to request a trial to testify to atrocities against humanity committed by the Taelons. A manhunt for Sandoval begins when he quits and leaves the mother ship. Liam has to protect him on his way to the grand jury.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Blood Ties
programme.desc: Strange assaults and several deaths may be related to a Doors/Taelon joint venture where Taelon core energy was used to heal people. It appears that the energy is being sucked back out of the patients.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Hearts and Minds
programme.desc: When Renee's boyfriend appears to her while he is imprisoned on the mother ship, Liam theorizes a special energy bond between the pair. Zo'or is upset by the human's betrayal and bans all humans from the mother ship.

programme.title: The Lost World: Nectar
programme.desc: To retrieve an antidote that will save professor Summerlee from deadly venom, the explorers must venture into a bee hive that no human has ever made it out of alive.

programme.title: The Lost World: Cave of Fear
programme.desc: Professor Challenger is taken hostage. To save him, the group, goes into the cave of fear to retrieve bones for a ritual offering. In the process, they revisit the dark corners of their past.

programme.title: The Lost World: Salvation
programme.desc: Summerlee saves an unconscious child from a river with CPR, which convinces the village leader they are witches. They will be burned on the stake unless they can influence the council otherwise.

programme.title: The Lost World: Blood Lust
programme.desc: Marguerite and Professor Challenger must save Roxton when he gets bit by a diseased man and transforms into a Vampire. Meanwhile, Veronica proves to two men that she doesn't belong to either of them.

programme.title: The Lost World: Out of Time
programme.desc: Marguerite, the reincarnation of the Druid's priestess, must fulfill her destiny by retrieving emeralds that will save them. Veronica has difficulty giving up a baby she has grown attached to.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
